broadcastShortInfo: Sends a message visible to all parties in the network
burnShortInfo: Burn a token in a token pool
datatypeShortInfo: Datatypes are broadcasts to the network so everybody refers to the same JSON schema when validating their data
defineContractInterfaceInfo: A Contract Interface is written in the FireFly Interface (FFI) format. It is a simple JSON document that has a name, a namespace, a version, a list of methods, and a list of events.
deployContractInfo: Follow these steps to deploy a contract on FireFly.
mintShortInfo: Generate a new token in a token pool
name: Name
notConnectedToFirefly: Not Connected to a FireFly Node
poolShortInfo: Token pools are a FireFly construct for describing a set of tokens
privateShortInfo: Sends a message to a restricted set of parties
registerContractApiInfo: Build an HTTP API for the smart contract you created, complete with an OpenAPI Specification and Swagger UI.
registerContractApiListenerInfo: Receive blockchain events happening in realtime.
transferShortInfo: Transfer tokens from one address to another
websocketConnectionFailure: Failed to connect to websocket. Please try again.
